name: Keruvim Recyclers
desc: Keruvim Recyclers increase the resources gained from salvaging abandoned stations, derelicts, floating hulks, and other such by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. Only affects the recovery of common resources such as fuel and supplies, and not rare items like blueprints. In addition, %s of the bonus applies to post-battle salvage.

name: Restricted Hangars
desc: The flight decks on this ship are somewhat restricted due lack of space and interfere with normal operation. Time to launch replacement fighters is increased by %s.

name: Keruvim Bulkheads
desc: Installs additional reinforced doors at critical junctures throughout the ship reducing crew casualties from hull damage sustained in combat by %s. and if disabled, the ship has a lower chance to break apart and higher chance at recovery after the battle thanks to modern Keruvim engineering.
short: ship almost always recoverable if lost. and reduces crew casualties.
